issues.name: As an admin I want to be able to create time specials
As a player I would like to be able to use time specials
As a player I would like to display the current upgrade in the game home page
As a player I would like to have a missions limit
As a player I would like to have a chance to capture enemy units
As a player I want to be able to create a list of planets
As a player I would like to to be able to send missions cross galaxies, when I have reached the required speed bonus
As a player I want to be able to intercept a enemy mission with a "speed bonus" when I have a unit capable of doing so
As a player I would like to have faction specials that can give me temporary units
As a player I want to send invisible missions when using ONLY invisible units
As a player I dont want to be able to send missions to planets outside my galaxy
As a player, I would like to unlock race specials, units and upgrades when I conquest a special location
As a player I want to be able to fast explore by using a single button in the planet
As a player I want to be able to enter in vacation mode
As a player I want to be able to choose all units to send to the mission, with a single button, or all of a certain type
As a player I would like to see new features in the login screen (by connecting to Trello board)
As a player I would like to be able to share my fight in the KGDW forums
As an admin I want to be able to choose with type of unit can attack with type of unit
As an admin I want to be able to add "speed bonus" to type of units
As an admin i want to be able to define units that can intercept a mission that benefits from a "speed bonus"
As an admin I would like to configure a "speed bonus" that when disponible, would allow travelling cross galaxies
As an admin I want to add invisible attribute to some units
As a system owner, I would like to be able to deploy a universe, using an existing database
As a player, I would like to see a summary of faction attributes, to be able to choosed the faction that better fits my gamestyle
As a player I want to have a ranking with at least battle points
As a player, I want to be able to create an alliance
As a player I Want to be able to deploy my units to other planets
As a player i don't want to be able to use selected types of units for missions, (for example Defenses, should only be allowed to use Deploy missions)
As an admin I want to define what missions can do each type of unit
As a player I want to have heroes
As an admin I want to be able to add an improvement to increase unit build speed
As an admin I wan to be able to add an improvement to upgrade research speed
As an admin I want to be able to define an unit as unique
As a player I want to have a limit on determinated types of units, for example in troops
As an admin i want to add  unit type amount limit
As a player I want energy to work like expected
As a player I want to be able to deploy units in other of my planets
As a player, i want to see the unit base attributes
As a player I want to see the gather report
As a player I want to be able to voluntary leave a planet
As a player I would like to cancel my running unit missions
As a pleyer, I would like to be able to delete my own units
As a player I would like to see the requirements for the units of my race
